name: Arctic Information Technology
description: Arctic Information Technology, A Doyon Government Group Company, has been providing industry specific software, hardware, IT support and technical training to small, mid-size and enterprise level companies for over a decade. Comprised of two teams, the Arctic IT Business Applications Team demonstrates its core expertise through Microsoft Dynamics GP, Dynamics CRM, SharePoint with a focus in finance, accounting, human resources, e-commerce, and customer service solutions.
